channel.title: Chapter 3 on Text Mining for Information Professionals
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 3 on Text Mining for Information Professionals

item.title: Personal Experience
item.description: I learned regular expressions through a Library Carpentry workshop five years ago, and now hardly a day goes by when I do not use this tool to extract data from a text file or to reformat or clean data that I have scraped from a website…. Author Jordan Patterson is a Cataloguing and Metadata Librarian at the Memorial University Libraries, St. John’s, Newfoundland, Canada.
